text: Actinosoma is a genus of South American orb-weaver spiders containing the single species, Actinosoma pentacanthum. It was first described by E. L. Holmberg in 1883, and has only been found in Colombia and Argentina. ==References== Category:Araneidae Category:Monotypic Araneomorphae genera Category:Spiders of South America
title: Actinosoma
